nested_title: Situation of the coronavirus (COVID-19) in Québec
Scenarios for the evolution of COVID-19
Scenarios for the evolution of COVID-19.title: Scenarios for the evolution of COVID-19
plaintext: On April 13, 2020, the Gouvernement du Québec has updated scenarios of the evolution of COVID-19 (PDF 824 Kb), which present projections of the number of possible cases, active hospitalizations and hospitalizations in intensive care.

The information presented in the document seeks to highlight the potential impact of COVID-19’s spread and the importance of abiding by the recommended confinement and physical distancing instructions.
Scenarios for the evolution of COVID-19.html:
On April 13, 2020, the Gouvernement du Québec has updated scenarios of the evolution of COVID-19 (PDF 824 Kb) , which present projections of the number of possible cases, active hospitalizations and hospitalizations in intensive care.

The information presented in the document seeks to highlight the potential impact of COVID-19’s spread and the importance of abiding by the recommended confinement and physical distancing instructions.

nested_title: Situation of the coronavirus (COVID-19) in Québec
Measures adopted by Orders in Council and Ministerial Orders
Measures adopted by Orders in Council an.title: Measures adopted by Orders in Council and Ministerial Orders
plaintext: The Gouvernement du Québec has signed Orders in Council and Ministerial Orders related to COVID-19.

The adoption, on March 13, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring a health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 19.36 Kb) (in French only), on March 20, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring renewal of the public health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 52 Kb), on March 29, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring renewal of the public health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 24 Kb), on April 7, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring renewal of the public health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 21 Kb) and, on April 15, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring renewal of the public health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 26 Kb).

This exceptional measure will, by way of an example, enable the Ministère de la Santé et des Services sociaux and establishments to prompotly purchase equipment or conclude the necessary contracts to protect the health of the population:

Order No. 2020-003 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 14, 2020 (byelection) (PDF 13.67 Kb);Order No. 2020-004 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 15, 2020 (PDF 82 Kb);Order No. 2020-005 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 17, 2020 (PDF 72 Kb);Order No. 2020-006 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued of Health and Social Services issued on April 9, 2020 (PDF 73 Kb);Order No. 2020-019 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 10, 2020 (PDF 19.38 Kb);Order No. 2020-020 of the the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 15, 2020 (PDF 156 Kb).
The minimization of non-priority services and activities by the adoption of and Order in Concil 223-2020 (PDF 37 Kb).
Measures adopted by Orders in Council an.html:
The Gouvernement du Québec has signed Orders in Council and Ministerial Orders related to COVID-19.

The adoption, on March 13, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring a health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 19.36 Kb) (in French only), on March 20, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring renewal of the public health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 52 Kb) , on March 29, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring renewal of the public health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 24 Kb) , on April 7, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring renewal of the public health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 21 Kb) and, on April 15, 2020, of an Order in Council declaring renewal of the public health emergency throughout Québec territory (PDF 26 Kb) .

This exceptional measure will, by way of an example, enable the Ministère de la Santé et des Services sociaux and establishments to prompotly purchase equipment or conclude the necessary contracts to protect the health of the population:

  • Order No. 2020-003 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 14, 2020 (byelection) (PDF 13.67 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-004 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 15, 2020 (PDF 82 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-005 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 17, 2020 (PDF 72 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-006 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 19, 2020 (PDF 30 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-007 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 21, 2020 (PDF 24 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-008 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 22, 2020 (PDF 39 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-009 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 23, 2020 (PDF 73 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-010 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 27, 2020 (PDF 160 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-011 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 28, 2020 (PDF 26 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-012 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on March 30, 2020 (PDF 119 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-013 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 1, 2020 (PDF 136 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-014 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 2, 2020 (PDF 125 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-015 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 4, 2020 (PDF 43 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-016 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 7, 2020 (PDF 21 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-017 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 8, 2020 (PDF 131 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-018 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 9, 2020 (PDF 73 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-019 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 10, 2020 (PDF 19.38 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-020 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 10, 2020 (PDF 20 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-021 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 14, 2020 (PDF 135 Kb) ;
  • Order No. 2020-022 of the Minister of Health and Social Services issued on April 15, 2020 (PDF 156 Kb) .

The minimization of non-priority services and activities by the adoption of and Order in Concil 223-2020 (PDF 37 Kb) .
